committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A resolution authorizing the President to annually proclaim the week of Thanksgiving Day as National Farmworkers Week.

summary.text: Authorizes and requests the President to designate the week of Thanksgiving Day of each year as "National Farmworkers Week."

titles.title: A resolution authorizing the President to annually proclaim the week of Thanksgiving Day as National Farmworkers Week.
